intro: Monelasmum macrophyllum, commonly known as the broad-leaf monelasmum, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, often growing in moist, shaded environments. Its botanical features make it a popular choice for ornamental gardening in suitable climates.
